entry.title: 24 Bush 168 Pcs Red Artificial Bloom Roses Flowers
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_1100
Type: Flower Bushes
Price: 39.99

[About]

Material: High Quality Polyester
1 Qty: 24 Bushes (Total 168 Roses)
Each Bush: 7 Roses
Each Rose Height: 2"
Each Rose Width: 3"
Stem Height: 13"
Removable Flower Head: Yes
Can be used as a single individual rose or in bunches
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Soft, smooth, and silky polyester roses are intricately handcrafted with amazing details and finest artistry to facilitate you lavishly in making the wonderful accents to any event,  DIY or home crafting projects. These lovely faux roses are crafted with high quality polyester and are rolled in an enchanting manner. The life-like appearance and vibrant shades of these flowers will add an eye-catching refreshing impact to your tabletops, backdrops, bouquets, vases, centerpieces and floral arrangements. Our high quality polyester buds are reusable, durable, and affordable. Unlike the fresh roses, that not only cost the fortune, but also wither in short time, these polyester roses will stay blooming and thriving forever. For extra glitz and glam, add some of our lustrous pearl sprays, ornate picks, glittered stem and ribbons to achieve that super chic look for prom corsages or wedding accessories and bouquets. If you are seeking something delicate but enchanting for your DIY project, these artificial polyester roses are just the solution. 

    Additional Information:

    • Material: High Quality Polyester
    • 1 Qty: 24 Bushes (Total 168 Roses)
    • Each Bush: 7 Roses
    • Each Rose Height: 2"
    • Each Rose Width: 3"
    • Stem Height: 13"
    • Removable Flower Head: Yes
    • Can be used as a single individual rose or in bunches
    • These are artificial, not fresh flowers
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: 8FTx8FT | Red Carpet Vinyl Party Backdrop, Hollywood Theme Photography Background Party Banner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 25.19

[About]

Quantity: 1 Party Backdrop
Material: Vinyl
Style: Red Carpet
Height: 8FT
Width: 8FT
GSM: 110
Features: Bright colors, Cost-effective, Foldable storage, Light weight
Fix the backdrop to walls with nails or tape.
You can also support it with a backdrop stand and clamps instead.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

 

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Since the Vinyl Backdrop do not have Rod Pockets (It is a Flat Backdrop), you will need to use Clamps to hang the item for use
    • Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor shooting.
    • You can also use some decorations to create a unique and exclusive party.
    • How to Care: Do not dry clean or machine wash. Wipe with a soft damp cloth. The item is sent folded and might have slight creases. If necessary, please iron the back surface with steam iron at low heat.  Or roll it up tightly with tube for 3-4 days. Please do not iron the front of the backdrop
    • Uses: Party, Baby Shower Event, Wedding Decoration, Newborn Baby, DIY Studios, Digital Photography, Video Shooting, Theme Parties.

entry.title: Pack of 12 - White Votive Candles with Red Votive Holder Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4300
Type: Decorations
Price: 8.99 - 97.09 (2 variants)

[About]

Candle Size: 2"
Glass Holder Size: 3" tall x 2" diameter
Burn Time: Approx. 3-4 hours inside holder. Actual burn time varies depending on temperature, wind, and other environmental conditions
Each order is for 1 dozen, 12 Candles + 12 Holders.
Not dishwasher safe.
Do not wash with hot water.
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Soft, romantic glow of candles always soothes the souls, relaxes the mind, and exalts the festive mood. No amount of lurid decorations can match the serene ambiance created by multitudes of softly-lit candles, exuding the exotic luminosity of passion filled celebration. Our translucent votive candle holders will make these votive candles glow in an enchanted manner.  Place these by the side of your aisle or passageway, hang these by our Manzanita tree centerpieces or simply scatter on the tables to transform your party venue into a trip to a fantasy land!

Additional Information:

  • Candle Size: 2"
  • Glass Holder Size: 3" tall x 2" diameter
  • Burn Time: Approx. 3-4 hours inside holder. Actual burn time varies depending on temperature, wind, and other environmental conditions
  • Each order is for 1 dozen, 12 Candles + 12 Holders.
  • Not dishwasher safe.
  • Do not wash with hot water.
  • Uses: Birthday, Wedding, Party, Table Decoration, Event Decoration
  • Note: This item not suitable for International Shipping.

s:variant.title: Case of 12 Packs(144 Candles and Holders Total)
